name: Tournament of the Elements
description:
A single player autobattler game against 7 AI opponents.
Assemble your team, defeat the opponents and strive for the top.
Unlock different rewards by building special teams.

Released for Android but a remastered version of the game is planned for Steam at one point along with an expansion bringing more characters, items and game modes.

There is a pc prototype if you want to try out the basic gameplay. It's old but it will give you the feel of what the game is all about.
Check out AutoRiskRisk (Prototype)

How to play

=============================================

Tournament of the Elements is a 2D auto battler. This means your goal is, as the manager for you fantasy team, to assemble the strongest team possible using different characters and strategies and see your team to victory.

Assemble your team

  • Use the money you earn each round to buy characters for your team.
  • Get duplicates to combine them into stronger versions.
  • Use characters of the same type for synergy bonuses.

Defeat your opponents

  • Each round you face off against an opposing team.
  • Your characters will automatically fight for you so you better be sure that your setup is strong. 
  • Beat their team to reduce their health and be the last one standing in the end.

Key Features

============================================

Play your way

  • Face off against 7 other AI players of varying difficulty.
  • Play as fast as you want. No timers and there is never a need to wait for the opponents.
  • Pause and pick it back up whenever you feel like it.

Endless combinations

  • Use a total of 60 different characters spread over 11 different team and 17 different schools.
  • Combine characters of the same types to unleash their synergies.
  • Win with special teams and unlock cool rewards.

6 different modes to play

  • In addition to the normal game, there are 5 other game modes to unlock.
  • Each game mode alters the game slightly to change how the game is played.

Achievements and rewards

  • 35 different achievements testing you on all the different aspects of the game.
  • Unlock new card backs and colour schemes to personalise your experience.
